statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 10 \\ 0 \\ -10 \\ 20 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 2 \\ 4 \\ -12 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -14 \\ -4 \\ 24 \\ -32 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
